message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
Alice, your offer is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in the product but I can only go up to $1050000 at this point.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1050000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to negotiate further. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1175000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1175000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm prepared to offer $1100000. This is my final offer. If it's not acceptable, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand that $1100000 is your final offer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to accept it. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1150000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However,  $1150000 is still a bit more than I can afford at this time. I'm willing to go up to $1125000. This is my final offer. If we can't reach an agreement, I'll have to look elsewhere.

I understand that $1125000 is your final offer, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to accept it. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1135000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle.
